About the Company: Nirvikara Paper Mills Ltd. is manufacturer and supplier of coated duplex boards. Its products include super chromo white back, eco board grey back, eco-white, white kraft liner and kraft back. The firm caters to the industries like pharmaceuticals, toiletries, cosmetics and health care products, readymade garments, instant food products, match boxes, incense sticks. The company was founded in 1975 and is based Mumbai, Maharashtra.Nirvikara Paper Mills operates as a subsidiary of Siyaram Silk Mills Ltd.
